dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you, uh, heard about this new thing in Astana? They're calling it a "digital dome."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you, uh, heard about this new thing in Astana? They're calling it a digital dome.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A "digital dome" is being launched in Astana: several high-rise buildings have been equipped with ultra-powerful cameras with a viewing radius of up to 10 kilometers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The one with the super powerful cameras, right? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The one with the super powerful cameras, right? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A "digital dome" is being launched in Astana: several high-rise buildings have been equipped with ultra-powerful cameras with a viewing radius of up to 10 kilometers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! I mean, we're talking cameras with a viewing radius of up to *ten* kilometers. Like, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! I mean, we're talking cameras with a viewing radius of up to ten kilometers. Like, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These cameras provide high-quality imaging and allow monitoring of objects and events within a 10-kilometer radius, the officer reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ten K? That's, that's an incredible reach. Um, where are these things even mounted?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten K? That's, that's an incredible reach. Um, where are these things even mounted?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, on high-rise buildings. Two of them on Abu Dhabi Plaza, then one each on, like, the Kazteleradio building, and two residential complexes, Prestige and Tomiris.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, on high-rise buildings. Two of them on Abu Dhabi Plaza, then one each on, like, the Kazteleradio building, and two residential complexes, Prestige and Tomiris.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Five ultra-powerful video cameras have been installed on high-rise buildings: two in the Abu Dhabi Plaza complex, and one each on the buildings of ˜Kazteleradio,™ the ˜Prestige™ residential complex, and the ˜Tomiris™ residential complex.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, these aren't just your standard CCTV, then. This is next-level surveillance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, these aren't just your standard C C T V, then. This is next-level surveillance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And get this: it's part of a much bigger picture. The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs' department, Sergey Vargo, he said they already have over 1.5 million cameras across the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And get this: it's part of a much bigger picture. The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs department, Sergey Vargo, he said they already have over one point five million cameras across the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This was reported by the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs' Department of Informatization and Communications, Sergey Vargo. According to Vargo, more than 1.5 million cameras across the country monitor key infrastructure sites...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] A million and a half? Nationwide? That's an insane number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A million and a half? Nationwide? That's an insane number.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! They're monitoring everything from train stations, airports, shopping centers, even schools and mosques. And, uh, residential entrances, elevators, public transport…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! They're monitoring everything from train stations, airports, shopping centers, even schools and mosques. And, uh, residential entrances, elevators, public transport...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...more than 1.5 million cameras across the country monitor key infrastructure sites: train stations, airports, shopping and entertainment centers, markets, schools, mosques, as well as residential building entrances, elevators, and public transport cabins.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, this "digital dome" is just, like, the cherry on top for Astana, then. What's the goal with all this, I mean?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, this digital dome is just, like, the cherry on top for Astana, then. What's the goal with all this, I mean?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the Ministry of Internal Affairs claims these systems have helped solve about six percent of crimes and over half of administrative offenses. So, they're framing it as a security measure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the Ministry of Internal Affairs claims these systems have helped solve about six percent of crimes and over half of administrative offenses. So, they're framing it as a security measure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Internal Affairs, video surveillance systems have helped solve 6% of crimes and more than half of administrative offenses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so there's a tangible benefit, I guess. Crime solving. But, uh, ten kilometers… that's a lot of, you know, everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so there's a tangible benefit, I guess. Crime solving. But, uh, ten kilometers... that's a lot of, you know, everything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It is. And the ministry even emphasized that this is ongoing, and they might scale this "digital dome" project to *other* regions of the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is. And the ministry even emphasized that this is ongoing, and they might scale this digital dome project to other regions of the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry emphasized that the development of digital technologies and the integration of video systems is ongoing, and the "digital dome" project may be scaled to other regions of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, man. So, Astana's just the test run for this hyper-surveillance future, potentially.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, man. So, Astana's just the test run for this hyper-surveillance future, potentially.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Potentially, yeah. It's a lot to, to think about, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potentially, yeah. It's a lot to, to think about, isn't it?
